Room.Name: Goblin Underground Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a well lit tunnel intersection in the goblin underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: Strangely, you notice the light is not coming from any torches, but instead there is a glow being emitted from panels in the ceiling. To the north, an archway leads to what may be the goblin's altar. There are several bronze statues of various goblins surrounding the archway. One particularly large and vicious looking chiseled statue has the name "Bythme" inscribed at the base. As you stand here, you hear a gratingly harsh sound of chanting and you smell burning flesh coming from that archway. Now you remember stories you heard in the pubs, of goblin blood sacrifices. The passage leads off into darkness in all directions.
